name: Snake The Nature Adventure
description:
3D snake from the creators of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Lost Alpha for PC.

An unforgettable adventure awaits you in green meadows and snow-covered fields, in abandoned dungeons and on unknown paths, plunge into the world of a snake and achieve your personal records!


 12 levels with varying difficulty that will open depending on your efforts (many of them with obstacles!)
   ue4 quality graphic
   the ability to choose the color of your snake
   also you can change the speed of it's movement
   a choice between classic and modern game
   a lot of custom masks and bonuses (and even more later!)
   gameplay which will raise your adrenaline to max levels!

You can always visit us here to get new updates!

••

Thanks BoxCat Games for their cool soundtrack!

Creators: Loxotron and Egorich___
